creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bare tree, LLC; thatch-roofed shelter at bottom center; water at center; mountains, URC; album contains twelve landscape paintings in a book; pages next to paintings and front and end pages are gold flecked; wood cover with paper label
marks: untranslated inscription, on label, on front cover
title: Landscape in the Manner of Ni Tsan
